Posts.Content: kma wrote: I am an identical twin who has a sister that has been diagnosed with Stage 2 breast cancer. She has tested positive for BRCA II gene. I am going for a biopsy myself tomorrow to make sure there is no issue with a small bump found in my right breast. Is there any other identical twin out there with this situation?, and if so howÂ is your twin doing? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Identical twins-one diagnosed with bc kma Deirdre1
